name: MonkApiData
description: Generic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on data schemas. Use GET to list all records or retrieve a single record by ID, POST to create new records, PUT to update existing records, and DELETE to remove records. Supports pagination with limit/offset query options when listing records. Requires authentication via MonkAuthRegister or MonkAuthLogin first. This is the primary tool for basic data operations - use MonkApiFind for complex queries with filtering and sorting, or MonkApiAggregate for analytics. All operations respect tenant isolation and access control permissions from the JWT token.

record_id.description: Record ID (required for GET/PUT/DELETE of single record)
